department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The acquisition of halal meat products including delivery to 3 regions: Montreal, Donnacona (Quebec) and La Macaza, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offers (RFSO): Halal Meat Products**
==============================================================

**Reference Number
---------------**
WS3800971876 - Doc3983124528

**Request Details
----------------**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for the acquisition of halal meat products.

**Product Description
-------------------

* Product Type: Halal Meat Products
* UNSPSC Code: 50110000 (Meat and Poultry Products)

**Bid Submission Requirements
-----------------------------

* Bids must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EDT on May 15, 2023.
* Late bids will be deemed non-responsive.
* Bidders must provide all required supporting documentation.

**Delivery Locations
-------------------

* Montreal, QC
* Donnacona, QC
* La Macaza, QC

**Notice and Contract Details
---------------------------

* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16121718?extsite=MTYxMjE3MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16121718?extsite=MTYxMjE3MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Alina Cocieru
	+ Email: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Trade Agreements
----------------

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA
